Welcome! Please read the following tutorial to help you get started!
Left click anywhere on the background to add new particles.
Right click or use arrow keys to pan your view.
Use the mousewheel or +- keys to zoom in and out.
The File menu at the top left of the screen can be used to save, load, or begin a new state.
The Physics menu can be used to on/off collision and alter the mechanics of gravity.
The Visuals menu can be used to change how Particle Sandbox looks. The trails are the most fun to play with!
The Generate menu offers automatic particle generation to save your finger from rapid clicking death syndrome.
There are more things on the top right. Have fun & please share if you enjoy it!
